entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening then freezing rain or rain changing to rain overnight. Periods of freezing rain north of Terrenceville overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Periods of freezing rain north of Terrenceville early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
